channel.title: 树 on TomtomYoung Blog 🧐
channel.description: Recent content in 树 on TomtomYoung Blog 🧐

item.description: 1. 遍历二叉树 1var {tree} = require('../重建二叉树/3.js') 2 3// 先序遍历 4var preTraResult = []; 5 6function preTra(tree){ 7 if(tree.val!='#'){ 8 preTraResult.push(tree.val); 9 preTra(tree.left); 10 preTra(tree.right); 11 } 12 else{ 13 preTraResult.push(tree.val); 14 return; 15 } 16} 17 18preTra(tree); 19 20console.log(preTraResult); 21 22// 中序遍历 23var inorderTraResult = []; 24 25function inorderTra(tree){ 26 if(tree.val!='#'){ 27 inorderTra(tree.left); 28 inorderTraResult.push(tree.val); 29 inorderTra(tree.right); 30 }
